1.t: (Muhammad), when help and victory comes from God,

2.t: you will see large groups of people embracing the religion of God.
2.tr: Wa-ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa

3.t: Glorify your Lord with praise and ask Him for forgivenes. He accepts repentance.
3.tr: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahoo kaana tawwaaba
